title: Wholistic Grace Herbal Detox
author: Name
cleaned_text: Description A gentle, deep detox. The herbs in this formula work together to purify and condition the blood and help protect and support organs of the body that are often negatively affected by toxicity, especially the liver. Includes herbs that are known to have antioxidants, which clear free radicals from the blood, (free radicals are unbalanced molecules that damage health) and a broad spectrum of major and trace minerals that are essential to the body. When these minerals are missing, the body tends to absorb harmful substances to try to counteract the deficiency. Good for weight loss support. Works best when taken daily for two to four weeks at a time. * INGREDIENTS: USP Grade Vegetable Glycerine, Purified Water, Sarsaparilla Root, Elder Berry, Chicory Root, Lemon Peel, Milk Thistle Seed, Sweet Goldenrod Herb, Black Walnut Hull, Burdock healthcare provider if you are pregnant, nursing, taking medication, or have a medical condition. SUGGESTED USE: Detox Program: 2mL (40 drops) 2 to 3 times a day. Maintenance Use: 1mL (20 drops) 1 to 3 times a day, or as needed. Shake well. SUPPORT SYSTEM: Cleansing Support
